steps.title: Launch dashboard
details: All tests begin by opening http://localhost:5173 successfully.
Early UI checks already flag inconsistent button styling and cramped layout.

steps.title: Click “Add Task” on dashboard
details: In three test runs the button is clicked without issue.
In the “Pin a Task” flow the element is reported “not stable” and the click times-out → HARD FAILURE (entire flow blocked).

steps.title: Add-Task modal appears
details: Modal opens when the click succeeds.
Automated visual checks repeatedly note mis-aligned labels, uneven spacing and missing ‘Select Categories’ label.

steps.title: Populate Task Name & Description
details: Input works but label alignment and font-size inconsistencies persist.

steps.title: Set Deadline
details: Date picker works, yet its label is sometimes missing or mis-aligned.

steps.title: Select Categories
details: Category combobox works; spacing/padding still called out as cramped.

steps.title: Choose Task colour
details: Both “Add a New Task” and “Mark Task as Done” flows cannot locate the colour picker/section → HARD FAILURE, test aborted.
UI checks simultaneously flag brand-inconsistent colours.

steps.title: Pick Emoji (skipped)
details: Because colour step fails, subsequent emoji and ‘Create Task’ actions never run.

steps.title: Create / Verify Task
details: Success messages and list updates are untested due to earlier failures.

steps.title: Pin Task flow (blocked early)
details: Add-Task button instability stops the scenario; pin-specific steps never execute.

steps.title: Mark Task as Done flow
details: Process mirrors add flow but again halts when colour picker is missing.

steps.title: Mark Task as Not Done flow
details: Currently pending at description/deadline stage; earlier steps mirror same UI concerns.

emotional_arc: User starts confident seeing dashboard but quickly notices visual rough edges. Successfully opening the modal gives brief reassurance, yet mis-aligned fields feel sloppy. Repeated spacing issues erode trust. Hitting a brick wall when the colour picker is invisible—and an unstable Add-Task button in another flow—creates sharp frustration and prevents goal completion. Because success messages are never reached, the overall sentiment ends in disappointment and low confidence.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Blocks task creation in multiple flows; users cannot finish primary job.
next_actions: Verify component is rendered and visible in modal for all screen sizes.
Add fallback or make colour optional until picker is fixed.
Include automated test to assert its presence.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: If the main CTA is hard to click, users are stuck at step 1.
next_actions: Investigate re-render or animation causing element instability; debounce or remove unnecessary motion.
Increase clickable area and ensure pointer cursor appears.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Mis-aligned or absent labels hurt clarity and accessibility (screen readers, WCAG).
next_actions: Adopt grid/flex layout with consistent gap tokens.
Audit all fields for required aria-labels and visible text.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Dense UI feels overwhelming and reduces readability on smaller screens.
next_actions: Define spacing scale in design-tokens; apply via global theme or utility classes.
Run automated visual regression for spacing.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Inconsistent styles weaken brand trust and make CTAs less discoverable.
next_actions: Create button component variants (primary, secondary, icon) in design system.
Refactor existing buttons to use these variants.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Low contrast impairs accessibility; off-brand colours appear unprofessional.
next_actions: Update palette tokens; verify in dark/light modes.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Feedback after task creation / status change
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Users need confirmation their action succeeded.
next_actions: Ensure toast or inline success message appears and is announced to screen readers.
Add automated assertion for message visibility.

first_tackles.description: Restore / expose colour picker or temporarily remove it from required flow so users can finish creating tasks.
Fix ‘Add Task’ button instability—disable animation on mount, confirm stable DOM before click.
Standardise form layout: align all labels & inputs, add any missing labels, apply consistent spacing tokens.
Introduce a single button component style (primary/icon) across dashboard and modal for instant visual cohesion.
Run automated colour-contrast check and correct any values failing WCAG AA; quick SCSS/Theme token update.
